text.content: yes, i admit that i am not a hardcore batman fan. i watched some batman movies before and had mixed feelings about them, some are good, some are not so much and even it‚Äôs good then maybe that batman is not always the center that had me sold. some batman i really like at the visually big-bad-ass looking and mentally-paranoia like batflex, some had the most ground-up, realistic and serious story and journey like christian bale version. some with the dirty dark nostalgia 80s-90s vibe that i couldn‚Äôt explain like keaton one. (man, lately i rewatch some of the val kilmer‚Äôs batman videos too)

text.content: the batman took no time to pump my adrenaline up to the max when mr. vengeance brutally beat the living batshit out of the gang member. i saw it in the trailer but still stunt by it. that is just the beginning cuz in the middle of the movie, the car chase scene with penguin took the adrenaline in me to the next level, i remember watching it and my heart pounding hard as shit, like i could have a stroke at anytime with the visually explosion and sounding from the speaker. feel like i am the penguin the the upside down car looking at the intimidating figure walking closer. damn good. lastly, at the end, batman popping pill (how crazy this ‚Äòtaking substance to become stronger‚Äô trope is used so much in superhero movie) and again beat a guy face to pulp. i really thought to myself a 2 questions:

text.content: i‚Äôm not gonna say much into the plot cuz u have to see it to believe (and also it‚Äôs 3 HOURS LONG), that mr. riddler had laid the masterplan, waiting for ya. his mastermind pulling strings even on batman as his puppet (and also an idol vigilante figure). riddler with his plan basically had na√Øve batman chasing and doing all of the dirty muscle works for him, always one step behind when discover any piece of truth that was intentionally given (yeah, behold, the greatest detective in his ‚ÄúsophomoreüòÇ‚Äù year). the convo between batman and riddler went apeshit(yes, i‚Äôm referring alfredüòÅ) when riddler challenge batman‚Äôs secret identity (or not). this sickhead riddling mf is very scary psychopath with a baby face (cute). loveeeeeeeee paul dano, feel bad for every movie starring him i had watched before like ruby spark or prisoner.
